Title: Requires towers to clean up any debris in the surrounding area resulting from the vehicles they are towing
Summary: Requires towers to clean up any debris in the surrounding area resulting from the vehicles they are towing and tow trucks to be equipped with the appropriate equipment for such clean up efforts.
LawCode: Add ยง399-xxx, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring towers to clean up any debris in the surrounding area resulting from the vehicles they are towing
